title: Facebook's Viewpoints app will pay you to take surveys, perform tasks
text: The market research app is designed to improve the social media site, according to the company.

title: Facebook and Twitter says hundreds of users gave improper access to data through third-party apps
text: Facebook and Twitter on Monday will announce that hundreds of users may have had their data improperly accessed after using their accounts to log into certain apps.

title: Facebook Viewpoints pays users for well-being surveys & tasks
text: Facebook is launching a new market research, task, and product testing program that lets users earn money. Starting today, people in the US who are over 18 can download Viewpoints and participate in a well-being survey so Facebook can learn to â€œlimit the negative impacts of social media and enhance the benefits.
